<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Ghoul Crocodile](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2062)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Ghoul" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=218" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #182: Graveclaw](/Sources.aspx?ID=143) pg. 32</row>

**Perception** +11; corpse scent (imprecise), [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** -5

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -4
</row>

**Corpse Scent** The ghoul crocodile can smell humanoid corpses in the water up to 1 mile away.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 60
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, swim 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +14,
**Damage** 2d8+6 piercing plus ghoul fever and [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d6+6 bludgeoning and paralysis

**[Aquatic Ambush](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=2)** <actions string="Single Action" />  35 feet

**Consume Flesh** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The ghoul crocodile is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour; **Effect** The ghoul crocodile devours a chunk of the corpse and regains 2d6 Hit Points. It can regain HP from any given corpse only once.

**Death Roll** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) **Requirements** The ghoul crocodile must have a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20); **Effect** The ghoul crocodile tucks its legs and rolls rapidly, twisting its victim. It makes a jaws Strike with a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll against the grabbed creature. If it hits, it also knocks the creature [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). If it fails, it releases the creature.

**Ghoul Fever**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** DC 19 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1 day); **Stage 2** 2d6 negative damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day); **Stage 3** as stage 2 (1 day); **Stage 4** 2d6 negative damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day); **Stage 5** as stage 4 (1 day); **Stage 6** dead, and rises as a [ghoul](/Monsters.aspx?ID=218) the next midnight

**Paralysis**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) Any living non-[elf](/Traits.aspx?ID=58) creature hit by a ghoul crocodile's tail must succeed at a DC 20 Fortitude save or become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

</column>
name: Ghoul Crocodile
